General.Name: Sebang Co Ltd
General.Description: Sebang Co., Ltd provides integrated logistics services in Korea. It offers container land transport services through a fleet of 213x tractors and 1,068x trailers; and cargo transport services through a fleet of 16 container yards and 5 railroad container depots. The company also offers heavy cargo loading, installation, and marine transport services; and third-party logistics services. In addition, it operates London metal exchange warehouses. Sebang Co., Ltd was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
